info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 10 at 4:43AM PDT until July 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 107 expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hottest weather expected Friday through the weekend. The heat is likely to continue into next week.
info.instruction: Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible, drink plenty of water, and avoid the midday sun.
